OrgName.entry: SHEFFIELD ASSOCIATION FOR PEOPLE WITH CEREBRAL PALSY (SAPCP)

Desc.entry: A registered charitythat enables people with cerebral palsy to integrate with mainstream society and promotes independence. Provides support, advice, counselling, home visits, recreation, grants and advocacy. Runs a day centre on Mondays (see separate entry) and a sport and leisure club, Sheffield Disabilities Sports and Leisure Club, on Wednesdays (see separate entry). Minibus available.
